name: The Speaker
description:
Daniel Riviera lives on an Earth very different from our own, populated by both aliens and humans. A. A. Arthur is one of those aliens, a very popular blogger and advisor for all of the planet's residents. Every day, he answers questions that stream in from the thousands who follow him—and, occasionally, from the hundreds who hate him. However, he has been injured, and has hired Riviera to assist in answering the user's questions

Walking in Riviera's shoes, the player's job is simple: Arthur tells you what advice to answer with, and you write it as he says.

Or do you?

My Patreon. (Special thanks to my Patreon, Bluebirdplays)
